references.paper_title: Instructpix2pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This work is significant as a baseline comparison in general image editing tasks and custom image editing scenarios, evaluating instruction following and consistency.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a parameter-efficient fine-tuning technique that reduces overfitting and has been integrated into EditLoRA to effectively transfer artistic styles from a small number of images.
It provides the foundations of DiT the Diffusion Transformer architecture utilized by the model.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, which reduces the computational demands.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper significantly improves the controllability of text-to-image diffusion models, enabling spatial constraints and depth information.
